doc:
William Fawcett (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Fawcett_(actor) 0 William Fawcett (born William Fawcett Thompson; September 8, 1894 – January 25, 1974) was a character actor in Hollywood B-films and in television. His career extended from 1946 until the early 1970s. He is probably best remembered for his role as the cantankerous, rusty-voiced Pete Wilkey of the Broken Wheel Ranch on the NBC series Fury, co-starring Peter Graves, Bobby Diamond, and Roger Mobley. He was one of the few actors to have earned a PhD degree. William_Fawcett ( born William_Fawcett_Thompson ; September_8_,_1894 – January_25_,_1974 ) was a_character_actor in Hollywood_B-films and in television . He was one of the_few_actors to_have_earned a_PhD_degree .
